test-case.name: MobileTestScenario("6","5","30",null)
test-case.output: Given I am a user on the Calculator app -> done: GenericStepDefinitions.GivenIAmAUserOnTheCalculatorApp() (0.0s) When I click "6" by "id" with selector "digit6" -> done: GenericStepDefinitions.WhenIClickElementByWithSelector("6", "id", "digit6") (0.5s) And I click "x" by "id" with selector "mul" -> done: GenericStepDefinitions.WhenIClickElementByWithSelector("x", "id", "mul") (0.8s) And I click "5" by "id" with selector "digit5" -> done: GenericStepDefinitions.WhenIClickElementByWithSelector("5", "id", "digit5") (0.7s) And I click "=" by "id" with selector "equal" -> done: GenericStepDefinitions.WhenIClickElementByWithSelector("=", "id", "equal") (0.7s) Then I should see "results" with text "30" by "xpath" with selector "//android.widget.EditText[1]" -> done: GenericStepDefinitions.ThenIShouldSeeElementWithTextByWithSelector("results", "30", "xpath", "//android.widget....") (0.8s)

test-case.name: MobileTestScenario("7","7","49",null)
test-case.output: Given I am a user on the Calculator app -> done: GenericStepDefinitions.GivenIAmAUserOnTheCalculatorApp() (0.0s) When I click "7" by "id" with selector "digit7" -> done: GenericStepDefinitions.WhenIClickElementByWithSelector("7", "id", "digit7") (0.4s) And I click "x" by "id" with selector "mul" -> done: GenericStepDefinitions.WhenIClickElementByWithSelector("x", "id", "mul") (1.0s) And I click "7" by "id" with selector "digit7" -> done: GenericStepDefinitions.WhenIClickElementByWithSelector("7", "id", "digit7") (0.9s) And I click "=" by "id" with selector "equal" -> done: GenericStepDefinitions.WhenIClickElementByWithSelector("=", "id", "equal") (0.8s) Then I should see "results" with text "49" by "xpath" with selector "//android.widget.EditText[1]" -> done: GenericStepDefinitions.ThenIShouldSeeElementWithTextByWithSelector("results", "49", "xpath", "//android.widget....") (0.6s)

test-case.name: CalculatorScenario
test-case.output: Given I am a user on Mortgage Calculator site -> done: GenericStepDefinitions.GivenIAmAUserOnMortgageCalculatorSite() (6.1s) When I enter text "250000" in the text field "Mortgage Amount" by "id" with selector "amount" -> done: GenericStepDefinitions.WhenIEnterTextInTheTextFieldByWithSelector("250000", "Mortgage Amount", "id", "amount") (0.6s) And I enter text "30" in the text field "Amortization Period" by "id" with selector "amortizationYears" -> done: GenericStepDefinitions.WhenIEnterTextInTheTextFieldByWithSelector("30", "Amortization Period", "id", "amortizationYears") (0.1s) And I enter text "30" in the text field "Interest Terms" by "id" with selector "interestTermYears" -> done: GenericStepDefinitions.WhenIEnterTextInTheTextFieldByWithSelector("30", "Interest Terms", "id", "interestTermYears") (0.1s) And I select option "Fixed" from dropdown "Interest Type" by "id" with selector "interestType" -> done: GenericStepDefinitions.WhenISelectOptionFromDropdownByWithSelector("Fixed", "Interest Type", "id", "interestType") (0.3s) And I enter text "4.38" in the text field "Interest Rate" by "id" with selector "rate" -> done: GenericStepDefinitions.WhenIEnterTextInTheTextFieldByWithSelector("4.38", "Interest Rate", "id", "rate") (0.2s) And I select option "10" from dropdown "Start Date" by "id" with selector "startMonth" -> done: GenericStepDefinitions.WhenISelectOptionFromDropdownByWithSelector("10", "Start Date", "id", "startMonth") (0.1s) And I select option "2017" from dropdown "Start Date" by "id" with selector "startYear" -> done: GenericStepDefinitions.WhenISelectOptionFromDropdownByWithSelector("2017", "Start Date", "id", "startYear") (0.1s) And I select option "Monthly" from dropdown "Payment period" by "id" with selector "paymentMode" -> done: GenericStepDefinitions.WhenISelectOptionFromDropdownByWithSelector("Monthly", "Payment period", "id", "paymentMode") (0.1s) And I click "Calculate Now button" by "id" with selector "button" -> done: GenericStepDefinitions.WhenIClickElementByWithSelector("Calculate Now button", "id", "button") (0.3s) Then I should see "Payment Amount - 1st row" with text "$1,248.95" by "cssSelector" with selector "#mortgage > div.calcHolder.flexContainer.mortgage > div.mortageTableWrapper > table > tbody > tr.active > td:nth-child(2)" -> done: GenericStepDefinitions.ThenIShouldSeeElementWithTextByWithSelector("Payment Amount - ...", "$1,248.95", "cssSelector", "#mortgage > div.c...") (1.3s) And I should see "Term Interest Cost - 1st row" with text "$199,622.19" by "cssSelector" with selector "#mortgage > div.calcHolder.flexContainer.mortgage > div.mortageTableWrapper > table > tbody > tr.active > td:nth-child(4)" -> done: GenericStepDefinitions.ThenIShouldSeeElementWithTextByWithSelector("Term Interest Cos...", "$199,622.19", "cssSelector", "#mortgage > div.c...") (0.1s)

test-case.name: TestScenario("how wonderful is the Gherkin language?",null)
test-case.output: Given I am a user on Google -> done: GenericStepDefinitions.GivenIAmAUserOnGoogle() (2.7s) When I enter text "how wonderful is the Gherkin language?" in the text field "Search" by "id" with selector "lst-ib" -> done: GenericStepDefinitions.WhenIEnterTextInTheTextFieldByWithSelector("how wonderful is ...", "Search", "id", "lst-ib") (0.7s) And I hit Enter by "id" with selector "lst-ib" -> done: GenericStepDefinitions.WhenIHitEnterByWithSelector("id", "lst-ib") (1.2s) Then I should be directed to "Google Search Results" page by "id" with selector "rcnt" -> done: GenericStepDefinitions.ThenIShouldBeDirectedToPageByWithSelector("Google Search Res...", "id", "rcnt") (0.2s) And I should see value "how wonderful is the Gherkin language?" in "search" field by "id" with selector "lst-ib" -> done: GenericStepDefinitions.ThenIShouldSeeValueInFieldByWithSelector("how wonderful is ...", "search", "id", "lst-ib") (0.2s)

test-case.name: TestScenario("did I do that?",null)
test-case.output: Given I am a user on Google -> done: GenericStepDefinitions.GivenIAmAUserOnGoogle() (0.6s) When I enter text "did I do that?" in the text field "Search" by "id" with selector "lst-ib" -> done: GenericStepDefinitions.WhenIEnterTextInTheTextFieldByWithSelector("did I do that?", "Search", "id", "lst-ib") (0.2s) And I hit Enter by "id" with selector "lst-ib" -> done: GenericStepDefinitions.WhenIHitEnterByWithSelector("id", "lst-ib") (1.2s) Then I should be directed to "Google Search Results" page by "id" with selector "rcnt" -> done: GenericStepDefinitions.ThenIShouldBeDirectedToPageByWithSelector("Google Search Res...", "id", "rcnt") (0.0s) And I should see value "did I do that?" in "search" field by "id" with selector "lst-ib" -> done: GenericStepDefinitions.ThenIShouldSeeValueInFieldByWithSelector("did I do that?", "search", "id", "lst-ib") (0.1s)

test-case.name: TooltipScenario
test-case.output: Given I am a user on Mortgage Calculator site -> done: GenericStepDefinitions.GivenIAmAUserOnMortgageCalculatorSite() (3.1s) When I hover over "icon next to Mortgage Amount" by "cssSelector" with selector "#mortageCalculatorForm > ul.inputFieldList.clearfix.left > li:nth-child(1) > div > a" -> done: GenericStepDefinitions.WhenIHoverOverByWithSelector("icon next to Mort...", "cssSelector", "#mortageCalculato...") (0.1s) Then I should see "Mortgage Amount info popup" with text "Enter the amount of your new or existing mortgage here." by "cssSelector" with selector "#mortageCalculatorForm > ul.inputFieldList.clearfix.left > li:nth-child(1) > div > a > div" -> done: GenericStepDefinitions.ThenIShouldSeeElementWithTextByWithSelector("Mortgage Amount i...", "Enter the amount ...", "cssSelector", "#mortageCalculato...") (0.1s)
